filters

Class Html2AsiiInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • java.io.BufferedInputStream
          • filters.Html2AsiiInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class Html2AsiiInputStream
extends java.io.BufferedInputStream
    This class extends BufferedInputStream. Overrides its read() method to avoid returning the characters inside the HTML tags and comments it detects. Uses its mark(), reset() and skip(int) tools to avoid the data.
    Author:
    Jaume
    See Also:
    BufferedInputStream
